## isNotNullish() function

A not nullish type-guard, where nullish is either `null` or `undefined`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isNotNullish<T extends unknown>(value: T): value is NonNullable<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | T |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

value is NonNullable&lt;T&gt;
